summary: This mod adds New Mounts in Solstheim (38 mounts [with 9 Fully Flyable mounts] in version 2.6 SKSE needed - 37 mounts in version 2.5)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size="7"]Monster Mounts Dragonborn [/size][/b] by gg77[/color] [color=#00ff00]versions 2.5 and 2.6 (SKSE version) [/color]

[color=#00ff00][b]9 Fully Flyable Mounts with the version 2.6[/b][/color] (DLC Dawnguard and [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/] Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) [/url] are Required)
[color=#00ff00][i]Bone Storm, Ash Guardian, Ahzidal, Dukaan, Seeker, Netch, Flying Shoggoth, Spectral Dragon, Flying Scrib[/i] [/color]

[color=#00ff00]Optional Files: Esp version Française[/color]

Monster Mounts Works with[url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14950/? ] Convenient Horses [/url] by Alek/ Mitchalek (“ermitaBoy”: ”Just ride your favorite monster once and it can be summon from anywhere. Two beautiful mods combined together gives you an amazing gameplay”)

[img]https://i.imgur.com/RPdxMaC.gif[/img]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=745913MonsterMountsDragonborn13.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/745913MonsterMountsDragonborn13.jpg[/img][/url]

This mod adds these mounts near the bulwarks of RavenRock (Solstheim) and in Attius Farm (or near):

1) Netch
2) Scrib (Ash Hopper)
3) Boar/Bristleback/Warthog
4) Lurker
5) Dwarven ballista
6) Seeker
7) Rieklings (4)
8) Spectral Dragon
9) Ash Spawn
10) Spiders (Albino Spider, Fire Spider, Glowing Spider, Poison Spider, Shock Spider)
11) Werebear
12) Acolytes Dragon priest (2)
13) Ash Guardian
14) Hulking Draugr
15) Boar/Bristleback/Warthog Riekling
16) WereDovahbear (Thanks to [color=#ff8c00]maymay1588[/color] for the mesh of this creature in his mod [url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30638 ]Dovahbear Companion [/url] by maymay1588 and zeroeternalz )

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=889418monstermountsdragonborn12.jpg][img]http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/889418monstermountsdragonborn12.jpg[/img][/url]

17) Silt Strider Tamed (In the game, you have "Dusty", but you can't mount her ![url= http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6viiXrKCdDM] Skyrim Dragonborn DLC - Last Silt Strider of Morrowind [/url])
18) Silt Strider Wild
19) Flying Shoggoth
20) Little Shoggoth
21) Shoggoth
22) Dwarven Page
23) Dwarven Charger
24) Spriggan Burnt
25) Mudcrab Solstheim
26) Bone Storm
27) Little Skeleton
28) Ascended Sleeper
29) Bloodsucker Fish

(Thanks to [color=#ff8c00]Vicn[/color] for the meshes of the creatures 17/18/19/20/21/22/23/26/27/28/29 in his mod: [url=http://naaaaikikvicnvicn.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-36.html] Creature Resource by Vicn [/url] )
[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=527328monstermountsdragonborn8.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/527328monstermountsdragonborn8.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#00ff00] New in version 2.6:[/color] (only)

30) Flying Scrib

Thanks to [color=#ff0000] Lifestorock[/color] for the mesh/textures of the Flying Scrib in the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24913/?]Skyrim Immersive Creatures [/url]by lifestorock

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=391674SKSEversionwith9FullyFlyableMounts1.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/391674SKSEversionwith9FullyFlyableMounts1.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000] [size="9"][b] Controls with the Fully Flyable Mounts [/b] [/size] [/color] ONLY for the [color=#00ff00][b]version 2.6 [/b][/color](DLC Dawnguard and [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/] Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE) [/url] are Required)


[color=#ff0000]UP[/color]: [color=#00ff00] Left Shift[/color]

[color=#ff0000]DOWN[/color]: [color=#00ff00] Left Ctrl[/color]

[color=#ff0000]DOWN to the ground quickly[/color]: [color=#00ff00] E or Space[/color]

[color=#00ff00] W[/color] (or Z): [color=#ff0000]forward[/color]

[color=#00ff00] S[/color]: [color=#ff0000]backward[/color]

[color=#00ff00] A[/color] (or Q): [color=#ff0000]turn left[/color]

[color=#00ff00] D[/color]: [color=#ff0000]turn right[/color]


When flying press [color=#ff0000]F12 [/color] to reconfigure the Keys (...a little problem: it is the default screenshot button on Steam ! You can go into Steam and disabled screenshots)

If there is a problem with the F12 key, uncheck the mod, make a backup and then check again the mod


[i] You only have to be careful to not crash into the ground (apparently they can also burrow underground) !

(With my setup !) I often need to restart the game a second time, in order to fly (problem with SKSE ?)[/i]


Thanks to [color=#ff8c00]NoxyGame[/color] and [color=#ff8c00]DOSMaster[/color] for the script of the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29860/? ] Pegasus MLP fully flyable [/url] “feel free to use/enhance the script/nif/mod, but give credits to the authors”

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=567251SKSEversionwith9FullyFlyableMounts2.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/567251SKSEversionwith9FullyFlyableMounts2.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=119041SKSEversionwith9FullyFlyableMounts4.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/119041SKSEversionwith9FullyFlyableMounts4.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000]INSTALLATION (very important)[/color]

1) The DLC Dragonborn is required

[color=#ff8c00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

2)You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#ff8c00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

3) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001


These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not

4) With the Shoggoth, the Werebear and the WereDovahbear (only) there is a little incompatibility with my first mod "MONSTER MOUNTS” (with 3 other “werewolbeast”: werewolf + guar + raptor ): you must place the. esp "MonsterMountsDragonborn" at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game to avoid getting the bugs (“[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YhRezz10NOo ]swimming[/url]”, “falling” and “jumping” bugs) with these mounts ...

5) If you have any problem with these mounts, you can try a FAST TRAVEL...

6) To change the speed or the health of the mounts, look at my screens

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=491362monstermountsdragonborn.jpg][img]http://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/491362monstermountsdragonborn.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=384980monstermountsdragonborn5.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/384980monstermountsdragonborn5.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=822998monstermountsdragonborn3.jpg][img]http://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/822998monstermountsdragonborn3.jpg[/img][/url]



With my mods, you have other Fully Flyable Mounts!

11 Fully Flyable Mounts with the version 2.7 of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20351/?] Monster Mounts [/url]:
Green Atronach, Magic Anomaly, Flame, Stormy, Paalaz, Pazuzu, Spectrum, Fire, Mjöllnir, Azraël, Nerthus

7 Fully Flyable Mounts with the version 1.5.1 of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25511/?] Monster Mounts Dawnguard [/url]:
Chaurus Hunter, Chaurus Hunter Fledgling, Soul Wisp, Death Wing, Red Naga, Swamp Naga, Skeleton Mistman

6 Fully Flyable Mounts (Blood/Reptilian/Pebbled/Swamp/Peat Bog Chaurus Hunters + Flying Scrib) in
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59433/?]Fully Flying Chaurus Hunters[/url]

And 58 Dragons in my mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61101/?] Fully Flying Dragons [/url]
author: gg77
